Employees.Name: William Smith
Employees.Biography: William Smith graduated from NYC with a BSC degree in 1990. He founded the company in 1998. Mr. Smith business skills quickly made the company profitable. He speaks fluently French and German.

Employees.Name: Charlie Good
Employees.Biography: Charlie Good graduated from Washington university with a BSC degree in 1995. He joined the company in 2001 and his skills in marketing were quickly recognized.

Employees.Name: Kevin Tylor
Employees.Biography: Kevin Taylor graduated from Colorado university with a BSC degree in 1990. He joined the company in 1999. Kevin likes to ski and surf when he's not working overtime.

Employees.Name: Patricia Holgate
Employees.Biography: Patricia Holgate has a BA degree from St. Lawrence College. Patricia has in depth knowledge in production. She loves music and sports.

Employees.Name: Peter Marshall
Employees.Biography: Peter Marchall has a BS degree in chemistry from Boston College (1988).

Employees.Name: Tracy Chapmann
Employees.Biography: Tracy Chapmann is a graduate of Sussex University (MA, economics). She has also taken the courses 'Multi-Cultural Selling' and 'Time Management for the Sales Professional'. She is fluent in Japanese.

Employees.Name: Jane Buckley
Employees.Biography: Jane Buckley has a degree in international marketing from the University of Colorado. She joined the company as a sales representative and was promoted to sales manager.

Employees.Name: Dave Zak
Employees.Biography: Dave Zak joined the company after completing his military service in 1997. He has also taken the courses 'Multi-Cultural Selling' and 'Time Management for the Sales Professional'.

Employees.Name: Stephen Maule
Employees.Biography: Stephen Maule has a BA degree in Marketing from St. Christopher College. He is fluent in French and German.

Employees.Name: Steve Tucker
Employees.Biography: Steve Tucker has a BA degree in Economics from the university of London. He is fluent in French and German.
